programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff refuses to let his newborn baby slow him down; he plans to move into his New Hollywood project to make room for the end of construction at Vista Valley; Gage lags behind, leaving Jeff to wonder if the tension between them will ever subside.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Moving day proves difficult for Jeff and Gage, as they have to work around Monroe's nap and feeding schedules; following the tumultuous move, the trio is finally able to settle into a routine; a client introduces Jeff to socialite Jackie Siegel.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Monroe's new nanny seems to be a great fit; the team heads to Florida to tour socialite Jackie Siegel's Versailles mansion, which is the largest and most expensive single-family house in the United States and represents a job opportunity for Jeff.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Back from Orlando, Fla., Jeff prepares his father's condominium for the market, schedules more demolition at Valley Vista and goes house hunting with one of his favorite clients, Jeanne Shaw; then, the childcare situation takes a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad, the Goodbye
programme.desc: In the wake of Gema's exit, Jeff receives a text message full of shocking accusations; drama ensues between the remaining housekeepers; Jeff and Gage juggle work and home life; when Jeff and Zoila meet, their conversation takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff and Gage face numerous challenges, caring for a newborn, moving into a new home and pushing the business into different directions, but Monroe's baptism is an opportunity to celebrate their blessings.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff focuses on flipping properties; there have been multiple additions to the team, with Jeff relying heavily on his new full-time assistant, Tyler; when Jenni returns from maternity leave, Jeff is not exactly sure where she fits in.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Gage lands a photo shoot for Jeff with furniture company Alder & Tweed; while the JLD crew scrambles to get everything in place, Jeff remains focused on Valley Vista; Jeff fails to endear himself to his new clients.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: The team heads to New York City; it's Monroe's first trip, making Jeff and Gage nervous; Jeff charters a private plane and brings along Monroe's nanny and grandparents; the team searches for real estate for Jeff's client, Julie Grossi.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff's project managers clash, only adding to the chaos he was hoping to alleviate; neighbor Lea Black is back in town and ready to get to work on renovating her kitchen; Jeff runs into trouble with another neighbor.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff and Gage compete over who does what around the house and whose flip is moving along the fastest; new troubles pop up at Valley Vista and Old Hollywood; team JLD is rehired by Calabasas clients Liat and Trevor.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.sub-title: The Straw(berry) That Broke the Camel's Back
programme.desc: Jeff's grandmother is rushed to the hospital; the added pressure doesn't stop any of his projects from moving forward; Jeff takes his frustration out on his employees and reevaluates who should remain on the payroll.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Julie's overly-involved approach to the flipping process clashes with Jeff's working style; with construction completed, the group sets out to furnish Heather's place; Valley Vista sees more personnel changes.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Attempting to start fresh, Jeff turns to friend Teddi Mellencamp's accountability program; JLD finds out that clients Liat and Trevor are headed for divorce; Jenni finds her dream home and hopes to quickly sell her house.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff is concerned with pleasing his new client's girlfriend who will be making most of the design decisions; Lea Black is in town to get started on her kitchen demolition; Jeff realizes his employees lack motivation; Megan makes a difficult decision.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lea Black leads a productivity seminar at Jeff Lewis Design, which brings a lot of issues to the surface and sparks a mass exodus; Jeff and Jenni have it out; Jeff and Jenni's relationship may not survive, and Jeff may not have any employees left.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff Lewis looks to his personal psychic for guidance as he deals with an overbearing employee and a troublesome piece of neglected property.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lewis' home goes on the market; an eccentric seller won't move out; a cat named Monkey escapes and Jeff must find it.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lewis and his business partner make a bet; Lewis questions having another psychic perform his house blessings.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lewis pits potential buyers against each other; Lewis' father visits.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lewis tries to find two much needed deals; the staff lets loose while the boss is away.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Lewis and his business partner plan to move into their new homes; Lewis shocks his staff.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: The entire team congregates at the empty Valley Oak One house for cocktails and dancing.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff and his business partner Ryan have taken on a historic restoration project to cope with the changing real estate market; Jeff's new boss accuses him of not working hard enough.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff gets the wrong shade of drapes and has a meltdown; Jeff commissions an original abstract portrait for Zoila as a special birthday gift.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: Jeff notices that work around his house isn't getting done, and he grows suspicious of his assistants.

programme.title: Flipping Out
programme.desc: In order to find out what is going on when he's not there, Jeff installs a hidden camera in his office.

programme.desc: Jeff must decide if, after many chances, he must finally fire Chris Elwood.

programme.desc: Jeff decides to go back to the historic restoration project.
